snippet: Jarrod Moses of United Entertainment Group says he and his colleagues travel by bus to meetings around the country. It builds trust and gets the creative juices flowing.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Jarrod Moses, founder and CEO of United Entertainment Group, who says he and his colleagues travel by bus to meetings around the country in effort to build trust and stir creativity.
lead_paragraph: Jarrod Moses of United Entertainment Group says he and his colleagues travel by bus to meetings around the country. It builds trust and gets the creative juices flowing.

headline.print_headline: Take the Bus, And Watch the New Ideas Flow
headline.seo: Jarrod Moses of United Entertainment, on Team Trust
headline.main: Take the Bus, and Watch the New Ideas Flow
